author: brett
msg: [CONTINUUM-2183] avoid failed startup because of cycle in projects. In other situations, instead of using the alphabetical sort, log the warning and continue so the list is mostly sorted

author: gscokart
msg: provides correct exception in case of error during initialisation of the transaction (usually it is followed by an abort that will fail and hide the original error)
